page.description: Get the status of a TransForm account

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: daysRemainingInTrial
property.description: if trial, number of days remaining. If negative, trial has expired

property.name: licensedUsers
property.description: if licensed, number of licensed users

section.title: Node
Xbasic
section.example: dim apikey as c = "Your_api_key" dim postdata as c dim url as c = "/GetAccountStatus" dim pr as p pr = a5dialogHelper_transformAPIQuery(url,postdata,apikey) if pr.error = .f. then dim result as c result = pr.result else dim errorText as c errorText = pr.errorText end if
